widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: New 50-State Surveys. We wrote 50-state surveys on foreclosure laws and procedures for the Foreclosure center, property division, and legal separation for the Divorce center. We also added car accident lawsuits for the Car Accidents center and wrongful death lawsuits for the Personal Injury center, respectively.
Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of the Debt Relief & Management and the Insurance Law centers by writing more snippets emphasizing critical points in these areas.
Child Safety Center. We have started to research and compile a new center for our Justia Legal Guides on child safety and related legal issues at home, school, and online, among other places.
Justia Mexico and Latin America Portals. We have updated the information of some of the most recognized law firms and legal consultation attorneys in Mexico and other Latin American countries.
